snippet.title: Super Human Identity Demo Trailer
snippet.description:
Watch the trailer for upcoming Visual Novel RPG Super/Human Identity.

Support us on Kickstarter and add us to your steam wishlist!

https://www.kickstarter.com/projects/rockarolegames/super-human-identity-a-choice-driven-visual-novel-relaunch

https://store.steampowered.com/app/1446310/SuperHuman_Identity/

https://rock-a-role-games.itch.io/superhuman-identity

Waking up with superpowers and no memory, five strangers find themselves in a struggle for survival and a search for answers. Pursued relentlessly, will their hardships bring them closer together or turn them against each other? And will everyone make it to the end? 

Super/Human Identity is an RPG/Visual Novel hybrid focused on player choice and variable group dynamics, coming to Windows and Mac. The game is recommended for mature audiences and contains violence, strong language, emotional distress, ableism, alcohol use, optional consensual sexual content, and existential crises. 

GAME FEATURES

Choose your avatar, pronouns and name as you develop your main character into who you want them to be with nuanced choices. Watch your personality take shape with our Identity Trait system.

Influence each of your companions' fates. Will they live or die? Who will they become if they survive?

Experience different group dynamics as a consequence of your choices. Any two characters can be friends or bitter enemies.

Romance one of 6 different characters – 3 male and 3 female – available for all genders. 

Think fast and use your telekinetic powers on the environment to defeat enemies. Choose between 4 difficulty settings ranging from Narrative to Superhuman.

7+ hours long, highly interactive, narrative gameplay. One story with vast variability.

Stylized, cel-shaded characters and backgrounds, with gorgeous painted CG artworks illustrating key story moments.

Epic, emotional, original soundtrack from composer Edwin Montgomery (Warhammer, Wasteland, Ghost In The Shell, Neverwinter; Dungeons&Dragons).

Accessibility features: Opendyslexic font, large UI, self-voicing support with additional descriptive text, captions.

Waking up with superpowers in an unfamiliar facility, the designation “Subject 5" is your only clue to a former life you have no memory of. On the run, fighting for your life, you join up with Subjects 1-4.    Together, you must cross a ruined city to get to safety and find answers. Beset by an external threat as well as internal conflict, you have to navigate your way through alarming revelations and difficult decisions, before finding   your freedom.

Superhuman or only human - you must reclaim your identity, or define who you are anew.

CREDITS:
Rock A Role Games https://www.rockarolegames.com/
Music by Edwin Montgomery https://www.edwinmontgomeryaudio.com/
CG art by Zirouu https://zirouu.myportfolio.com/

Copyright 2021 Rock A Role Games
